description: interior view of a church looking down on congregation with men standing at sides and women seated at center--some figures processing; very large sculpted altarpiece at front with angels; painting above altar appears to be Last Supper scene
creditline: Gift of Thomas and Marsha French in honor of Rev. Richard Hillstrom
